item.description:
A nite to relax after eating too much turkey and before the holiday shopping! Come for a facial and a massage.

My friend, Rosa of Alluring Beauty Spa in Manchester will give each of you a mini facial for $20 (a $90 value) and her associate will give you a 10 min massage for $10 (a $50 value). Your choice...one or both!

Champagne and hors d'oeuvres will be provided.

First come, first served, only open to 10 people.

group.name: Connecticut Theatre Group Arts-Theater Events Group Discount

item.name: Not-so Extreme Makeover Nite
